description.displayText: Soranyi is simply the BEST. She looked after both my kids for almost 6 years. I attribute my kids's respectful and responsible behavior to her caring and engagement with them. She started taking care of my daughter when she was 2 years old. She was a difficult eater and needed a lot of attention that was difficult for me as I was pregnant the second time. We thank God for sending her to us. My daughter started eating well and loved Soranyi. Soranyi also started taking care of my son right from birth. He loved her too. You can trust her with your children. She always finds things to do with them and engages children very well. You will not find anyone as good as her fo sure. We had to let her go as my children did not need a nanny anymore but she is the best with children, especially toddlers and guides them so well as they grow up. We all love her and are still in touch. She still takes my kids out for a movie, gives them presents atleast once a year.

description.displayText: Soranyi is amazing! Responsible, reliable, loving and fun. She was only with us for a short time because she needed full time and my children are in school, but my children and I fell in love with her. She keeps in touch and I would hire her again and a second!
description.originalText: Soranyi is amazing! Responsible, reliable, loving and fun. She was only with us for a short time because she needed full time and my children are in school, but my children and I fell in love with her. She keeps in touch and I would hire her again and a second!

description.displayText:
Soranyi is simply amazing! She joined our family a few months back when my baby was 12 months - shy with lots of stranger anxiety. Soranyi would take him to playgrounds, stores, have play dates, take him to the library and various other places just to work on his stranger anxiety. In just a short time the anxiety disappeared and he now loves being around kids and the crowd no longer scares him.
Soranyi is an extremely hardworking, punctual and honest individual who will love and care for your child just as much as you. She is extremely knowledgeable about infant and toddler development and helps build the right skills in the baby through play, story times, singing and arts. She makes amazing home cooked baby food which a lot of times we have ended eating as well. My toddler has definitely flourished under her care. He loves and adores her! With us moving to a different state we have to say bye to her. If I could I would pack her up and take her with us! If you need the best of care that includes lots of love with good skill development, Soranyi is the perfect nanny for you.

description.displayText: I highly recommend Soranyi. She is very skilled caring for infants and children. I have confidence in her judgment and I have always felt comfortable leaving my sons in her care.
description.originalText: I highly recommend Soranyi. She is very skilled caring for infants and children. I have confidence in her judgment and I have always felt comfortable leaving my sons in her care.

description.displayText:
I recommend Soranyi. I have known Soranyi for 15 years, she was extremely dedicated to my children, she is reliable, trustworthy, and she always seemed very genuinely interested in the well being of my two boys. She is very skilled in planning, preparing and serving meals, preparing formulas and changing diapers, bathing, dressing and feeding infants and children. She was the best at supervising and caring for my children's needs.
Sincerely,
Mercedes
